title: Slice Keyboard Version 2.1
summary: Slice Keyboard version 2.1 is available for the full and demo versions. Version 2.1 fixes an  issue that would cause unintentional gestures on some devices that register touch events when a finger was hovering over the screen, most notably the Nexus 7.
